Title: Relates to primary election voting ballots in cities with a population of one million or more as of the latest federal decennial census
Summary: Relates to the order of candidate and delegate names on primary ballots in cities with a population of one million or more as of the latest federal decennial census and provides for a rotation of names in subsequent elections.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to primary election voting ballots in cities with a population of one million or more as of the latest federal decennial census
